00020 // Description : Overwrite the spin pattern to save runs whose spin patterns
00021 //             : were screwed up
00022 void AsymRecover::OverwriteSpinPattern(int index)
00023 {
00024    cerr << "Recovery: Spin pattern is ovewritten by user defined pattern index(" 
00025         << index << ")" << endl;
00026  
00027    for (int bid=1; bid<N_BUNCHES; bid++)
00028    {
00029       gMeasInfo->fBeamBunches[bid].SetBunchSpin( (ESpinState) UserDefinedFillPattern[index][bid-1] );
00030    }
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 // Description : Overwrite the fill pattern to save runs whose fill patterns
00035 //             : were screwed up
00036 void AsymRecover::OverwriteFillPattern(int index)
00037 {
00038    cout << "Recovery: Fill pattern is ovewritten by user defined pattern index(" 
00039         << index << ")" << endl;
00040  
00041    for (int bid=1; bid<=N_BUNCHES; bid++)
00042    {
00043       gMeasInfo->fBeamBunches[bid].SetFilled( UserDefinedFillPattern[index][bid-1] );
00044    }
00045 }
00046 
00047
